rutils

Class Direction

  • java.lang.Object
    • rutils.Direction

  • public final class Direction
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static operations of integers, which act as Directions

    0 (up), 1 (right), 2 (down), 3 (left) are valid directions

    Since:
    2/14/16

      The number of directions

    • Method Detail

      • isVertical

        public static boolean isVertical(int dir)
        Returns:
        True is the direction is vertical (up or down)

      • opposite

        public static int opposite(int dir)
        Parameters:
        dir - direction to which opposite is desired
        Returns:
        an int representation of the direction accross from dir

        public static int right(int dir)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        an int representation of the direction right of dir

      • left

        public static int left(int dir)
        Parameters:
        dir - direction to which left is desired
        Returns:
